Minecraft Wiki A Guide to Minecraft in your pocket
By Matthbo

Content:
* Mechanics * Dimensions * Modifications
More comming soon...

Mechanics:
Not build yet... Retry later... maybe...

Dimensions:
Not build yet... Retry later... maybe...

Modifications:
There are a lot of mods, for this you are going to make a separate book for that mod.
You will get that as you start with the mod. If you don't know how to start there are pages after this one that will tell you how to begin.

Mod's available:
- BuildCraft - ComputerCraft - EnderStorage - EquivelantExchange - IndustrialCraft - Magilution - Mystcraft - Natura - TherminalExpansion - TinkerersConstruct
